I can also see myself wearing these all summer as loungewear or with shorts. If I sized down it would‚Äôve given me more cleavage than I wanted. The ONLY con I have is that the size varied slightly by color. The black and white fit more snug (which I preferred). The denim blue and Jade green fit a little looser as you can see in the side profile picture of the denim blue set.Shorts- these are great dupes as well! The back pocket completely fits my iPhone XR. I personally like this for camp so my walkie doesn‚Äôt pull them down, but if you have more of a square figure it may pay to size up. The tank meets right where these shorts start. My only complaint on these is sometimes the way they lay can look a bit funky in the crotch area, but nothing too major. The colors all looked great. I wore the white with red underwear and it didn‚Äôt show through where the mesh liner was.As a set- Black is perfect and what you‚Äôd expect. The white is a CRISP white. The Jade green shorts were a slightly different shade than the tank. It was not enough for my husband to notice without telling him. For some reason it looks a lot different in the photo but they‚Äôre more similar in person. The blue is a pretty darn close match. If anything, the band is slightly different due to the different material. It‚Äôs not a dealbreaker for me, as I plan to mix and match a lotFinal thoughts- I love them.
